mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(EXTRACT (YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) ||'-'||'AR'||'-'|| (select lpad(nvl(to_number(substr(max_ea_no,9,3)),0)+1,3,0) from ( SELECT max(ea_no) max_ea_no FROM ELEC_APPROVAL where ea_no like '%'||#{form_code}||'%' )) FROM DUAL

SELECT EAP.*,FORM.FORM_TITLE,AF.* FROM ELEC_APPROVAL EAP JOIN EA_FORM FORM ON EAP.FORM_CODE = FORM.FORM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN APPROVAL_FILE AF ON EAP.EA_NO = AF.DOC_NO WHERE DRAFTER_ID = #{emp_no} ORDER BY DRAFT_DATE DESC

SELECT VIEW_INFOS.*, D.DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME FROM VIEW_ELEC_APPR_INFOS VIEW_INFOS JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON VIEW_INFOS.DRAFTER_ID = E.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO
WHERE DRAFTER_ID = #{drafter_id} AND EA_NO = #{ea_no}

SELECT EA.*,FORM.FORM_TITLE, E.EMP_NAME DRAFTER_NAME FROM ELEC_APPROVAL EA JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON DRAFTER_ID = EMP_NO JOIN EA_FORM FORM ON EA.FORM_CODE = FORM.FORM_CODE WHERE ( RESULT_CODE=0 and FIRST_APPROVER=#{emp_no} ) OR ( RESULT_CODE=2 and ((SECOND_APPROVER=#{emp_no} AND STATUS_CODE IN(6,14)) OR (THIRD_APPROVER=#{emp_no} AND STATUS_CODE IN(4,12)) OR (FINAL_APPROVER=#{emp_no} AND STATUS_CODE IN(8))) )
